errorMessages

Object with the error messages displayed by the application.
Source:

Methods

executionTimeController()

Waits 800ms before showing an error message. If for example we lose the internet connection while trying to load the API this message will be displayed.
Source:
  • app.js, line 13

loadGoogleMaps(callback)

Executed when the window.onload is ready loads asynchronously the Google Maps API. Writes the script tag for the Google Maps library. For more information https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/javascript/tutorial
Parameters:
Name Type Description
callback loadGoogleMaps~startApp This callback must be supplied within the src attribute of the script in order to make this method work.
Source:
  • app.js, line 50

loadMapsEror()

That function will display an error message if the application was not able to load the Google Maps library.
Source:
  • app.js, line 21
